pageContext.claim: “One of your great pollsters, who actually got it right -- you know the gentleman I'm talking about -- he said, well, Trump is going to win Pennsylvania, but you have to allow at least 5 percent for cheating, because they cheat." And that's in Philadelphia and various areas around Philadelphia. They cheat, and they cheat like crazy.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump baselessly claims Democrats routinely commit fraud in Pennsylvania. He particularly calls out a majority-Black city, without evidence.
